messages.message: morning folks :slightly_smiling_face: could someone please generate a sign up token for a bofa user for me?

I think most of the site admins are on PST, so we should probably come up with a process for this. I just used the testing admin account to generate it for now, but we probably shouldn’t do that moving forward
Every employee has permissions to create new users btw. Just need to put in their email and a username for them and hit the `Create` button (https://instabase.com/apps/admin/users).
That’s probably the best way for us to setup accounts for customers. reduces the risk of tokens getting shared out there and potential competition signing up

fair enough @Heymian. this user was seeing "you are on the waitlist" so i thought it would be easier for them to promote their existing account. in the future, should i delete the existing user and create a new one?
hrm that’s a good question, we don’t support deleting users (just deactivating), so they would have to unstick themselves if they get to that point
okie doke. not sure how this user got to the point where they had a waitlisted account, but i'll bear that in mind going forward!
